page.title: 11STOPSLEY JUNIOR SCHOOL
page.content: The age range is from 2 to 11 years and most of the children walk to school as they live in the Stopsley area. Some parents held a jewellery party and raised enough money for tracksuits and netball kit. Sports equipment costs Â£150 p.a. and crash mats cost Â£50 each. The school has a small field for sports and also uses the nearby Regional Sports Centre for football. The school has ten teachers plus the headmaster. Two of the teachers are supply teachers. There are nine classrooms in the school altogether. There are just over two hundred pupils in the school which is a mixed school.
